TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry

summary.span: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.

span.span: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks クラスは、その発行者を参照する名前を各信頼された発行者の証明書をマップして、信頼された発行者のディクショナリを保持します。The class maintains a dictionary of trusted issuers by mapping the certificate of each trusted issuer to a name that refers to that issuer. 証明書は拇印の形式でエンコードされた ASN.1 を使用して指定します。The certificates are specified using the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint. 発行者名は、アプリケーションのスコープ内で一意である限り、任意の文字列にすることができます。The issuer name can be any string, as long as it is unique within the scope of the application. このディクショナリはを介してアクセスできる、プロパティです。This dictionary can be accessed through the property. クラスは、X.509 証明書を解決できるだけです。The class can only resolve X.509 certificates. 信頼された発行者のマップが下のエントリを追加することで、構成ファイルで指定された、 [ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)要素。The map of trusted issuers is specified in a configuration file by adding entries under the [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element. ``要素の子要素、 [ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)要素が有効な場合に、でクラスを指定、`type`その要素の属性です。The `` element is a child element of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element and it is valid when the class is specified in the `type` attribute of that element. 詳細については、これらの各要素のドキュメントを参照して、 [WIF 構成スキーマ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9)です。For more information, see the documentation for each of these elements in the [WIF Configuration Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9). 発行者名レジストリの詳細については、次を参照してください。、クラスです。For more information about issuer name registries, see the class. 派生できます構成ベースの発行者名レジストリの独自の実装です。You can derive from to implement your own configuration based issuer name registry. どのメソッドをオーバーライドするには、実装は異なります。Which methods you override will depend upon your implementation. たとえば、オーバーライドすることができます、カスタム構成スキーマから構成を読み込みます。For example, you can override the method to load configuration from a custom configuration schema. ## Examples 次の XML の構成を表示する、セキュリティ トークン ハンドラーのコレクションに追加します。The following XML shows configuration for a added for a collection of security token handlers. ``要素は、従来の .NET 構成コレクションのように動作できるように、 ``、``と``子要素としての要素。The `` element behaves like a classic .NET configuration collection, allowing the ``, `` and `` elements as child elements. ``` ```

The name of the issuer.

summary.span: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.

span.span: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 発行者を追加するには、このメソッドを呼び出すことができます、ディクショナリ。You can call this method to add issuers to the dictionary. 派生クラスからこのメソッドを呼び出すことができます、ディクショナリに発行者を追加します。In derived classes, you can call this method from the method to add issuers to the dictionary.

span.span: is or empty.
-or- is or empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfiguredTrustedIssuers As IDictionary(Of String, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ ConfiguredTrustedIssuers { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.

span.span: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.

value.span: 信頼された発行者を格納するディクショナリ。

span.span: A dictionary that contains the trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 辞書にキーであり、ASN.1 エンコード形式の信頼された発行者の証明書の拇印の値は、発行者名。The key to the dictionary is the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint of the trusted issuer's certificate and the value is the issuer name. ディクショナリには、構成に指定されている発行者とに追加されているその他の発行者が含まれています、メソッドです。The dictionary contains the issuers that were specified in configuration and any additional issuers that have been added with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetIssuerName(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken) cil managed

param.name: securityToken
param.span: The security token for which the issuer name is requested.

span.span: The security token for which the issuer name is requested.
Should be assignable as .

summary.span: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.

span.span: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.

returns.span: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the dictionary; otherwise, .

span.span: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the dictionary; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 実装の既定の検索、ディクショナリで指定された X.509 証明書の拇印の`securityToken`します。The default implementation searches the dictionary for the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate specified in `securityToken`. エントリが見つかった場合、発行者名が返されます。それ以外の場合、`null`が返されます。If an entry is found, the issuer name is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 場合`securityToken`から割り当てることはできません、`null`が返されます。If `securityToken` is not assignable from , `null` is returned.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList customConfiguration) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (customConfiguration As XmlNodeList)

param.name: customConfiguration
param.span: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.

span.span: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.

summary.span: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.

span.span: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks メソッドは、構成のインフラストラクチャによって呼び出されます。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. このメソッドが呼び出されたときに、`nodelist`の最上位レベルの子要素が表示されます、 [ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)構成ファイルからの要素。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element from the configuration file. 属性または派生クラスを定義する構成スキーマに応じて子要素これらの各に含めることがあります。Each of these may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. このメソッドは、構成のインフラストラクチャによって呼び出されます。This method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 既定の実装がから構成を読み込む、 [ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)要素 (下で構成されている、 [ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)要素)。The default implementation loads configuration from a [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element (configured under the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element). 派生クラスで、独自のカスタム構成要素をサポートするには、このメソッドをオーバーライドすることができます。You can override this method to provide support for your own custom configuration elements in derived classes.

span.span: is .

exception.span: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.

span.span: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.
